DataElement.preferredDefinition: The  status of disease when administrator systemic corticosteroids.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Affecting an entire system._Hormones synthesized in the cortex of the adrenal gland and consist of two subclasses, glucocorticoids (carbohydrate regulation) and mineralocorticoids (electrolyte regulation)._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (sis-TEM-ik) Affecting the entire body.:Hormones synthesized in the cortex of the adrenal gland and consist of two subclasses, glucocorticoids (carbohydrate regulation) and mineralocorticoids (electrolyte regulation).(NCI)

Concepts.definition: Affecting an entire system.
Hormones synthesized in the cortex of the adrenal gland and consist of two subclasses, glucocorticoids (carbohydrate regulation) and mineralocorticoids (electrolyte regulation).
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredName: Response Assessment in Neuro-Oncology Criteria Status
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An update to the MacDonald criteria for assessing disease progression and treatment response in glioblastoma multiforme (GBM)._A condition or state at a particular time.
